abstract: The imports have been stopped after a banned fungicide was used on trees by growers for the Coca-Cola Company, which owns the Minute Maid brand.
snippet: The imports have been stopped after a banned fungicide was used on trees by growers for the Coca-Cola Company, which owns the Minute Maid brand.
lead_paragraph: The United States has temporarily halted shipments of imported orange juice from all countries while they are tested, and said it will destroy or ban products containing even low levels from a banned fungicide.

headline.main: U.S. Halts Import of Orange Juice
headline.print_headline: U.S. Halts Import of Orange Juice
